- Create OnbButtonStyle conforming to ButtonStyle protocol
- Add invisible background to outline style for full tappability
- Implement special duolingo animation with shadow offset on press
- Add onbButtonStyle extension for clean API with trailing closure syntax
- Include comprehensive previews demonstrating all styles and animations
